         00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

         04 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 40 44 04 44 44 44 44 44 44 40 44 04 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 44 40

         00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
; --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;
CC_MoveCtrl_Up              = .......# ; $01 - ladder      - only allowed to move down
CC_MoveCtrl_Right           = .....#.. ; $04 - floor start - only allowed to move right
CC_MoveCtrl_Down            = ...#.... ; $10 - ladder/pole - only allowed to move down
CC_MoveCtrl_Left            = .#...... ; $40 - floor end   - only allowed to move left

CC_MoveCtrl_Floor           = .#...#.. ; $44 - floor  mid  - 
CC_MoveCtrl_Ladder          = ...#...# ; $11 - ladder mid  - 
; --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;
